title: CLsgdxb
author: CLsgdxb
content: Check out the maker/taker rates from Prime 6 categories https://www.huobi.com/support/en-us/detail/84907272843344For market makers & brokers enquiries, contact Head of VIP Client Services, charmaine.lim@huobi.com

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Any proof of authenticity for this email? I dropped it in their handles authenticator and it returned:Quote from: https://www.huobi.com/en-us/verification/Unofficial channelThe charmaine.lim@huobi.com you inquired is NOT the official channel of HuobiI did "support@huobigroup.com" as well just to make sure email addresses are acceptedQuote from: https://www.huobi.com/en-us/verification/Huobi Official EmailThe support@huobigroup.com you inquired is the official Email of Huobi

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Huobi Global has the lowest fees? What a huge jokeHave you taken time to make comparisons with different exchanges?How many people have a trading volume of at least $15M in the last 30 days in order to enjoy prime 6 category fee cuts?Huobi's category 6 fee ratesSpot - 0.055%(Marker) 0.07%(taker)Futures - 0.004%(marker) 0.0295%(taker)let's compare with other exchanges1.Bybit pro 1 category fee rate which i equivalent to $15M trading volume in the last 30 daysSpot - 0.0%(Marker) 0.03%(taker)Futures - 0.0%(Marker) 0.04%(taker)2. Phemex Level 4 account which is equivalent to $15M trading volume in the last 30 daysSpot - 0.05%(Marker) 0.07%(taker)Futures - -0.025%(Marker) 0.075%(taker)

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Huobit has lowest fees, is it true?Not lowest withdrawal fee for Bitcoin: https://withdrawalfees.com/coins/bitcoinNot lowest taker/ maker trading fee: https://www.cryptowisser.com/exchanges/In addition, if you are real representative of Huobi on Bitcointalk, you should make a service announcement more professional.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: tbct_mt2 on July 18, 2022, 03:20:29 AMIn addition, if you are real representative of Huobi on Bitcointalk, you should make a service announcement more professional.Also a representative here in forum form a high profile Huobi should at least be a copper member or a reputable account in forum which is totally opposite of the OP. I dont think he is from Huobi but trying to seek probably attention or referrals when someone message the email but I doubt its even real though. Could be a dummy email with saved response attached with a phishing or something we could call a sweet talk scam statement.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I think that low withdrawal fees are the new marketing ploy that many platforms resort to. Instead of high withdrawal fees, platforms can manage their work by taking hidden fees such as transaction fees, lower exchange rates, trading fees, and other hidden deductions.Therefore, do not make fees the only reason to invest, but rather one of them in addition to the response of the support team, volumes of liquidity, and legal issues.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.created_time: July 18, 2022, 07:32:42 AMLast edit: July 18, 2022, 01:30:29 PM by Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on July 17, 2022, 07:50:48 PMHuobi's category 6 fee ratesSpot - 0.055%(Marker) 0.07%(taker)Futures - 0.004%(marker) 0.0295%(taker)After I got verified on Huobi global, I was in level 1, people that can move up to upper level need to have certain amount of money or coins on the exchange but which I do not just have. On Binance and OKX, such level comes with low fee if compared to Huobi global, I wished I continue to use Huobi global, but the high fee let me leave the exchange. It was 0.2% fee for spot trading when I left like two months ago.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on July 18, 2022, 07:32:42 AMI wished I continue to use Huobi global, but the high fee let me leave the exchange. It was 0.2% fee for spot trading when I left like two months ago.That's too high lol, better look for suitable alternativesÂ  After looking at their fee rates, I never even bothered getting verified with them. The good thing is there are so many exchanges to check out. Some even still have relaxed KYC policies like OKX, FTX, Kucoin etc

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: CLsgdxb on July 17, 2022, 02:03:19 PMCheck out the maker/taker rates from Prime 6 categories https://www.huobi.com/support/en-us/detail/84907272843344For market makers & brokers enquiries, contact Head of VIP Client Services, charmaine.lim@huobi.comThis post was very suspicious to me, are you really serious with what you are saying here?Second this was your first post only then after that nothing follows, so what is the purpose of this thingsanyway? and for me this is too high how come that it became lowest?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Magkaisa on July 21, 2022, 01:12:55 PMThis post was very suspicious to me, are you really serious with what you are saying here?Obviously he wasn't seriousQuote from: Mr. Magkaisa on July 21, 2022, 01:12:55 PMSecond this was your first post only then after that nothing follows, so what is the purpose of this thingsTo scam unsuspecting users using the fake email he posted in the OP. Check out this reply

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on July 18, 2022, 05:01:15 AMAlso a representative here in forum form a high profile Huobi should at least be a copper member or a reputable account in forum which is totally opposite of the OP.Buying a Copper Membership and get rights to post images are enough. If Huobi wants to have their announcement thread here, they can do it with a real representative, with a real newbie account.If you hire a trusted member to post an announcement thread, you will have risk that you won't control that thread. The poster can turn to scammer, can be dead, can leave the forum for personal reason.If you have a company and want to be here, let's create an authentic newbie account with a Copper Membership. It is not expensive for an exchange like Huobi or for any company.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: CLsgdxb on July 17, 2022, 02:03:19 PMCheck out the maker/taker rates from Prime 6 categories https://www.huobi.com/support/en-us/detail/84907272843344For market makers & brokers enquiries, contact Head of VIP Client Services, charmaine.lim@huobi.comAssuming that this user is actually a Huobi employee trying to promote the platform, this "promotion" is such an obscurely poor attempt at promotion knowing Huobi's size. So bad that I'd think that it was a scam if it weren't for the legitimate-looking email address.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: tbct_mt2 on July 24, 2022, 09:56:28 AMBuying a Copper Membership and get rights to post images are enough. If Huobi wants to have their announcement thread here, they can do it with a real representative, with a real newbie account.If you hire a trusted member to post an announcement thread, you will have risk that you won't control that thread. The poster can turn to scammer, can be dead, can leave the forum for personal reason.If you have a company and want to be here, let's create an authentic newbie account with a Copper Membership. It is not expensive for an exchange like Huobi or for any company.OP is a scammer, lol. Do you think he cares about copper membership. He isn't the representative of Huobi group. Proof of authenticity shows that the email address shared by him is not official.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: tbct_mt2 on July 24, 2022, 09:56:28 AMIf you hire a trusted member to post an announcement thread, you will have risk that you won't control that thread. The poster can turn to scammer, can be dead, can leave the forum for personal reason.Got a point but at least those who will inquire or ask question will probably feel relief that there is a legit rep from Huobi especially that someone is highly reputable in here. I doubt if the representative will be like hhampus, darkstar or any known reputable manager would suffice the scam notion. But you are right, its always much better to provide own member from Huobi coming here creating account and make necessary announcement.
